WorkItem.ClosedComment: No longer a known issue in 2.3.14.
WorkItem.Description:
I decided to reload my toon from the armory today to see if something in my existing xml file was causing the warlock haste issue and I came upon an interesting finding.  By selecting certain buffs, MP5 gems give a negative score.
 
I loaded Isosmall from Proudmooe via the armory.  I selected Slot: Gems > normal > all normal (since I wanted to see when haste started giving negative results).
 
I started selecting the buffs I use in the raid (top to bottom): Sanct Ret, Imp Moon, Bloodpact/improved, AI, BOW/improved, moonkin, totem of wratch, divine spirit, fort/improved, motw/improved, BoK, etc
 
After setting each buff, I would scroll to the bottom of the normal gems window to verify that haste had not gone negative.  Once I reached BoK, I had gems with negative values, but they wer the MP5 gems.  
 
I then attempted to find a minimum set of buffs that would make the gems go negative and that is what is attached in the xml file.  The minimum set of buffs I found was Improved BoW, Divine Spirit, Improved MOTW and BoK.  With those selected, the MP5 gems give a negative value.  If you unclick any of the buffs, the gems are no longer negative.
